wine.name: Single Vineyard Malbec
wine.description: Complex, with a great duet between ripe red fruits, spices, loading floral wood that gives smoked, snuff and vanilla, very, very mild dose. In the mouth rewarded with a long journey, somewhat tense, but nothing tiresome, leaving behind a rough texture.

winery.name: CHANDON California
winery.description:
CHANDON is a global community of winemakers, rooted in a domain on which the sun never sets.

We have been crafting exceptional sparkling wines since our founding in 1959 in Mendoza, Argentina. In 60 years of excellence, the pioneering spirit that’s embedded in our DNA has taken us all over the globe to California, Brazil, Australia, China, and India.

We are now made up of six personalities under one identity, all making outstanding quality wines, united by our shared personality and values. Our mission has always been to open a world of possibilities in sparkling wine. 

It is as relevant today as it was six decades ago.

Napa, California was the next territory to beckon, after Robert-Jean became convinced of the potential of this region for quality sparkling. The idea was considered revolutionary both in France and in America. The United States had always been a minor market for wines and US demand for California sparkling wines even smaller.

CHANDON California was founded in 1973, betting the emergence of a sparkling-wine maker, and began producing under the direction of Dawnine Dyer in terroirs identified by John Wright.

wine.name: Cool Harvest Sauvignon Blanc - Cabernet Rosé
wine.description: Refreshingly crisp and light bodied, showing bright summer cranberry fruit flavours with fresh grassy notes, finishing soft and clean.

wine.name: Sattui Family Red
wine.description: It has ripe, plummy flavors explode in the mouth with straightforward, refreshing fruitiness, all rounded out with hints of vanilla and spicy oak in the finish.

wine.description: It has  complex from one of the premier growing regions for the grape. Its ripe berry fruit and soft tannins make it a great match with nearly any meal.

wine.name: Pinot Noir
wine.description: Aromas of clove and toasted black walnut, which are joined by black cherry, roasted meat and crushed herbs. Its structure is assertive yet attractive with flavors of black currant, pomegranate and bittersweet chocolate.

name: Domaine Michel Mallard Ladoix 'Le Clos Royer' Rouge 2013

wine.name: Ladoix 'Le Clos Royer' Rouge
wine.description: An intense  variety of red fruits like morello cherries, redcurrant and blackcurrant. In the mouth, it is charmingly subtle and a plesure on the taste buds. A perfect balance with a full - bodied struture.
